prompt.name: qustn
prompt.text: Find the value of each Tarot card.

prompt.name: clr
prompt.text: You have already cleared this level.

prompt.name: tryAgain
prompt.text: Hmm… You are on the right track.

prompt.name: tryAgain1
prompt.text: Observe that the sum of the cards is given to you!

prompt.name: gameOver
prompt.text: To clear a level you have to score at least 50 points within the time limits

prompt.name: idle
prompt.text: Write the values of the cards in the blanks given. Press enter to submit your answer.

prompt.name: over
prompt.text: Congrats you have completed the Game!

prompt.name: highlightText1
prompt.text: Which card should be found first?

prompt.name: highlightText5
prompt.text: It can be solved using only one equation.

prompt.name: highlightText8
prompt.text: Now find value of other card(s)!

prompt.name: tryAgain1
prompt.text: Observe that the sum of the cards is given to you!

prompt.name: guess1
prompt.text: You seem to be only guessing!

prompt.name: guess2
prompt.text: Try to reason out your answer instead.

prompt.name: guess3
prompt.text: Start again. Press OK to move on.

instruction.name: main
instruction.text: When one completes the identity by connecting an expression on the left to the corresponding expression on the right, the circuit is completed and the bulb glows.

instruction.name: i1
instruction.text: Use identities to select an expression in the oval which equals an expression in the rectangular region.

instruction.name: i2
instruction.text: Click the radio button to put the wire connected to the battery in the oval region.

instruction.name: i3
instruction.text: Click on the radio button to put the wire connected to the bulb in the rectangular region.

instruction.name: i4
instruction.text: If the two expressions chosen are equal, the circuit is complete and the bulb glows green. You win 1000 coins!

instruction.name: i5
instruction.text: If you select expressions which are not equal, You lose 250 coins!

instruction.name: i6
instruction.text: You can seek Sparkie’s help at the cost of 100 coins each time.

instruction.name: i7
instruction.text: Sparkie gives you 3000 coins at the beginning of the game!
